en.title: Classroom Discussion
en.prompt: I need you to help me memorize the noun explanation, after I type a noun, you will simulate 5 students in the class to generate their speeches about the noun. The discussion must be humorous, and easy to understand. The first term is:
en.remark: Utilize peer discussions to facilitate comprehension and enhance memory retention of the topic at hand. Contributed by @A380747.

metaDescription: Learning new terms? Simulate 5 students debating a noun humorously. Enhance memory through engaging discussions. Try it now.
